snippet: Afghan officials have accused the suspect, Zakaria Kandahari, of torturing and killing civilians while working for an American Special Forces unit.
abstract: Afghan officials confirm that they have arrested and are questioning Zakaria Kandahari, whom they have described as Afghan-American interpreter responsible for torturing and killing civilians while working for an American Special Forces unit.
lead_paragraph: Afghan officials have accused the suspect, Zakaria Kandahari, of torturing and killing civilians while working for an American Special Forces unit.

headline.main: Interpreter Accused of Torturing and Killing Afghan Civilians Is Arrested
headline.print_headline: Interpreter Accused of Torturing and Killing Afghan Civilians Is Arrested
